title: Transjakarta App
description: Developing an app for PT Transjakarta that leverages an AI model and live GPS to provide live bus location, ETA, and nearby bus stops.

title: RISTEK-GPT
description: RISTEK-GPT is a helpful AI assistant designed to address user inquiries related to Fasilkom UI and RISTEK questions. We enhance the Retrieval Augmented Generation system with a vector-based search engine and Gemma LLM generator.

title: Legislative Document Alignment Test with Legal Textual Entailment
description: Introducing an AI-based Legal Textual Entailment system to test and ensure the harmony of legal clauses, aiming to aid policymakers and streamline the legislative process.This innovation led us to be featured in various media coverage and invited to various law firms, startups, state agencies, and ministry.

title: PilgrimPal: Umrah AI Companion App
description: PilgrimPal is an AI-based mobile application that aims to help pilgrims with their activities related to Umrah. This app contributes to helping pilgrims communicate, informing them of crowdedness in an area, and identifying their future needs. Our two main features are live CCTV crowd detection and AI chatbot assistance.

title: Brent: Medical Search Engine
description: Brent is a specialized health-themed search engine that combines traditional fast indexing technique with advanced AI reranking algorithm to ensure robust retrieval of health-related information

title: Pantau Jalan: AI-Based System for Prioritizing Road Damage
description: Pantau Jalan is an AI-based system for prioritizing road damage through social media reports and app inputs. It features location detection, decision-making on actionability, damage estimation, and priority determination to aid government responses for better road infrastructure in Indonesia.

title: Vehicle License Plates Detection using Transformer Based OCR
description: This project aims to enhance traffic enforcement and security in Indonesia through AI-based OCR technology. It focuses on accurately detecting license plate numbers from various image conditions, achieving up to 0.98 accuracy on validation data. This holistic approach outperforms traditional character segmentation by maintaining high accuracy even in unclear images.

title: Estimating Passenger Density in Trains through Crowd Counting Modeling
description: The KRL Commuter line is popular to use for its comfort and efficiency, but many users are dissatisfied, especially due to unpredictable overcrowding. This research develops a dataset, k-F1 metric, and method that can predict train passenger density through crowd counting.

title: Prediction of House Prices in the Jabodetabek Area using Multimodal Approach
description: Rising urbanization and population growth in the Jabodetabek area drive increased housing demand. However, determining the accurate price for decision-making in transactions is a challenge. With the approach of multimodal Machine and Deep learning, the proposed method is well-performed in estimating house prices with RMSE of 26 million rupiahs.

title: Fire Image Detection Using CNN Method with Skip Connections
description: In 2021, Indonesia experienced 17,768 fire incidents, causing significant loss of life and property. The fire detection method is crucial in minimizing the impact of fires. Therefore, we proposed an AI method with CNN using skip connections. We achieved a well-performed method with an accuracy of 95% with an inference time of 0.1 images per second.

title: Early Earthquake Detection based on Seismic Wave with ML Ensemble and EQTransformer
description: Indonesia faces frequent natural disasters, including earthquakes. To improve early detection and minimize losses, my team (Three Neurons) conducted research on 'Early Earthquake Detection in Indonesia Using Machine Learning Ensemble and EQTransformer.' Our study focuses on utilizing AI technology to accurately detect seismic activity, allowing for more effective and timely issuance of early warnings.

title: Water Trash Video Detection using REPP and Bounding Box Linking
description: In 2020, Indonesia had 5.75 million tons of waste in its waters. This marine debris poses risks to clean water sources and aquatic life. Our team (Three Neurons) proposes a research solution using AI technology, specifically the method 'Detection of Waste Water Surface On Video Objects with REPP and Tubelet Bounding Box Linking Methods.' This method could be integrated into an automated waste detection system in Indonesian waters using video data.

title: Household Authority Inequality
description: Create an interactive infographic to analyze the causes of authority inequality in the household and eliminate the patriarchal view that husband authority is superior to wife.

title: Inequality Gender Employment
description: This project analyzed the gap between male and female employment rates in Indonesia through dashboard visualization. The dashboard visualization is expected to help women find solutions to overcome job equality. As well as a recommendation system to help women find jobs that match their qualifications.

title: Konteksto
description: Konteksto is an Indonesian 'Guess the Word' game powered by Artificial Intelligence, where players attempt to uncover a secret word using unlimited guesses.
